channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Smart Image Gallery
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Smart Image Gallery

item.title: CVE-2024-3632|2024-07-31T15:38:13.804Z -- unknown -- smart%20image%20gallery
item.description: The Smart Image Gallery WordPress plugin before 1.0.19 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack

item.title: CVE-2024-3632|2024-07-13T06:00:04.124Z -- unknown -- smart%20image%20gallery
item.description: The Smart Image Gallery WordPress plugin before 1.0.19 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack
